meanings.definition: Excessively concerned with minor details or trivial matters.
meanings.sent1: She is so overfussy about her appearance that she spends hours picking out the perfect outfit.
meanings.sent2: The overfussy teacher insisted on rearranging the classroom desks multiple times a day.
meanings.sent3: The overfussy cat refused to eat its food unless it was served in a specific bowl.
meanings.sent4: His overfussy nature was like a magnifying glass, making every small issue seem huge.
meanings.sent5: The overfussy gardener meticulously pruned each leaf on the plant, one by one.

meanings.definition: Showing excessive attention to detail or cleanliness.
meanings.sent1: The overfussy homeowner would spend hours dusting every corner of the house.
meanings.sent2: She was overfussy about her workspace, ensuring every pencil was perfectly aligned.
meanings.sent3: The overfussy chef would not serve a dish unless every ingredient was measured precisely.
meanings.sent4: His overfussy behavior towards cleanliness made him the butt of jokes among his friends.
meanings.sent5: The overfussy tailor inspected every seam of the dress with a magnifying glass.
